description: Manage the metadata for file in file system.

commands.name: az storage fs file metadata show
commands.summary: Return all user-defined metadata for the specified file.
commands.syntax:
az storage fs file metadata show --file-system
                                 --path
                                 [--account-key]
                                 [--account-name]
                                 [--auth-mode {key, login}]
                                 [--blob-endpoint]
                                 [--connection-string]
                                 [--sas-token]
                                 [--timeout]
examples: az storage fs file metadata show -p dir/a.txt -f fsname --account-name myadlsaccount --account-key 0000-0000

commands.name: az storage fs file metadata update
commands.summary: Sets one or more user-defined name-value pairs for the specified file system.
commands.syntax:
az storage fs file metadata update --file-system
                                   --metadata
                                   --path
                                   [--account-key]
                                   [--account-name]
                                   [--auth-mode {key, login}]
                                   [--blob-endpoint]
                                   [--connection-string]
                                   [--sas-token]
                                   [--timeout]
